{"id":680906388,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 days, 8 hours","timestamp":1650034161,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/680906388/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum White Tiles After Covering With Carpets","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumWhiteTiles(string floor, int C, int L) {\n        int n = floor.length();\n        vector<int> prefSum(n+1, 0);\n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n            prefSum[i] = prefSum[i-1] + (floor[i-1] == '0');\n        }\n        \n        vector<vector<int>> dp(C+1, vector<int>(n+1, 0));\n        for (int f = 0; f <= n; ++f) {\n            dp[0][f] = prefSum[f];\n        }\n        for (int c = 1; c <= C; ++c) {\n            deque<array<int,2>> minq;\n            minq.push_front({0, 1});\n            for (int f = 1; f <= n; ++f) {\n                if (f >= L) {\n                    dp[c][f] = dp[c][f-1] + (floor[f-1] == '0');\n                    dp[c][f] = min(dp[c][f], minq.back()[0]);\n                    if (--minq.back()[1] == 0) {\n                        minq.pop_back();\n                    }\n                } else {\n                    dp[c][f] = 1e9 + 7;\n                }\n                array<int, 2> add{dp[c-1][f] + prefSum[f], 1};\n                while(!minq.empty() && minq.front()[0] >= add[0])  {\n                    add[1] += minq.front()[1];\n                    minq.pop_front();\n                }\n                minq.push_front(add);\n            }\n        }\n        /*\n        for (auto v : dp) {\n            for (int i : v) cout << i << ' ';\n            cout << endl;\n        }\n        */\n        return dp[C][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-white-tiles-after-covering-with-carpets"}
